title: Where is the mystery skin box????
body: The mystery skin box which valued 490 RP! I cant find it any more, where is it??

replies.body:
Mystery Gifting boxes can be purchased in the **Gifting Center** at any time, however, if you were looking to mystery gift *yourself*, you're currently able to do so. Self-mystery gifting is only available during certain events and is currently not enabled.

For complete details on Mystery Gifting, check out [our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
